title: Bertie's Guide To Life And Mothers
description: Alternate Cover Edition for ISBN: 1846972531 (ISBN13: 9781846972539)It's not that poor Bertie Pollock is wishing his life away, but having anticipated his 7th birthday for so long he's now longing to be 18. But there's a lot of living to do and Bertie isn't alone amongst the residents of Scotland Street in trying to do just that - with mixed fortunes.
author: Alexander McCall Smith
